sentences.en: A small investment brings a ten thousandfold profit.
And this ten - thousandfold cosmos shivered & quivered & quaked.
sentences.cn: 此 十千 宇宙在颤动、抖动、震动.

sentences.en: Because they have been defeated, the energy of their resistance has increased aa thousandfold.
sentences.cn: 因为他们已经被打败, 他们反抗的力量会增大千百倍.

sentences.en: He said himself that he could find no words for it that were adequate and that if he should ever be able he would repay me a thousandfold .
sentences.cn: 他自己也说到想不出恰当的字眼来表达他的感激之情，并且说假如有一天他力所能及，一定要给我千倍的报答。

sentences.en: He suffers a thousandfold more from his so-called freedom than from his imprisonment in natural existence.
sentences.cn: 比之人所谓的天赋存在的自由，他遭受千倍的是天赋存在的枷锁。

sentences.en: It'shows a thousandfold selectivity for fluoride over other common anions.
sentences.cn: 它对氟离子的选择性比其它普通阴离子高几千倍.

sentences.en: The water is treated, purified and sold to us, often at a thousandfold increase in price.
sentences.cn: 这些水经过处理和纯化后卖给消费者，其价格常常翻了一千倍。

sentences.en: What Joanne sends out with her Really Useful Attitude comes back to her a thousandfold and becomes a joyous, self-fulfilling reality.
sentences.cn: 乔安娜为人处事的态度传达给别人时就会以千倍的欢乐和自我满足反馈给她自己。
